metadata.title: CVE-2013-7273 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: GNOME Display Manager (gdm) 3.4.1 and earlier, when disable-user-list isset to true, allows local users to cause a denial of service (unable tologin) by pressing the cancel button after entering a user name.

criterions.comment: gdm: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
